subject: Football (College)
Heisman Trophy
lead_paragraph: Texas A&M’s Johnny Manziel hasn’t always made good decisions since winning the Heisman Trophy last December, and strong action by the N.C.A.A. might be what he needs.
snippet: Texas A&M’s Johnny Manziel hasn’t always made good decisions since winning the Heisman Trophy last December, and strong action by the N.C.A.A. might be what he needs.
